bibdata.title: IEEE/ANSI Standard for the Programming Language Extended Pascal
IEEE/ANSI Standard for the Programming Language Extended Pascal

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The standard provides an unambiguous and machine-independent definition of the computer programming language Extended Pascal by specifying requirements for a processor and for a conforming program. Its purpose is to facilitate portability of Extended Pascal programs for use on a wide variety of data processing systems. Two levels of compliance are defined for both processors and programs.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
